item.title: Shatrughan Sinha blasts Mukesh Khanna for jibe at Sonakshi Sinha's upbringing: 'Who appointed him guardian of Hinduism' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Shatrughan Sinha blasts Mukesh Khanna for jibe at Sonakshi Sinha's upbringing

Date: Dec 18, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Shatrughan Sinha has come to the defense of his daughter, Sonakshi Sinha, after actor Mukesh Khanna criticized her upbringing following her inability to answer a question about the Ramayana on a quiz show.

  • Mukesh Khanna criticized Sonakshi Sinha for not knowing a Ramayana answer on KBC.
  • Shatrughan Sinha questions Khanna's authority to comment on Hinduism.
  • Sonakshi's response highlighted the gender bias in Khanna's remarks.
  • Shatrughan expressed pride in Sonakshi's achievements and defended her character.
‚ÄúNot answering a question on the Ramayana doesn‚Äôt disqualify Sonakshi from being a good Hindu. She doesn‚Äôt need a certificate of approval from anyone.‚Äù - Shatrughan Sinha

This public dispute highlights the ongoing conversation around celebrity culture, online scrutiny, and personal autonomy in the public eye.

item.title: Pushpa 2 The Rule stampede: Show cause notice issued to theatre management after woman's death at Sandhya theatre - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 The Rule Stampede: Show Cause Notice Issued to Sandhya Theatre for '11 Lapses' After Woman's Death at Premiere

Publication Date: December 12, 2023 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Hyderabad police has issued a show cause notice to Sandhya Theatre for lapses leading to a woman's death during the premiere of Allu Arjun's 'Pushpa 2'.

  • The notice outlines 11 alleged lapses by the theatre management.
  • Management failed to inform police about Allu Arjun's arrival, leading to crowd mismanagement.
  • No proper guidance for entry and exit points, encouraging crowd gathering without permission.
  • Inadequate security arrangements resulted in the tragic incident.
  • A case registered against Allu Arjun and theatre management following a complaint from the deceased woman's family.
  • A medical update indicated the boy injured in the incident is in stable condition but still requires intensive care.
‚ÄúThe neurological condition is severely impacted. The doctors have opined that it will be a long haul before any improvements can be seen.‚Äù

The incident has raised significant concerns about safety protocols at major events, highlighting the need for strict adherence to crowd management practices.

item.title: India's 'Laapataa Ladies' OUT of Oscars 2025; UK's Hindi-language film 'Santosh' shortlisted for 'Best In - TOI Etimes
item.description:
India's 'Laapataa Ladies' OUT of Oscars 2025; UK's Hindi-language film 'Santosh' shortlisted for 'Best International Feature Film'

Publication Date: (Not Provided) Source: (Not Provided)

An overview of the recent Oscar nominations reveals that India's 'Laapataa Ladies' has not made the cut for the Oscars 2025, while the UK-produced Hindi film 'Santosh' has secured a spot in the 'Best International Feature Film' category.

  • 'Laapataa Ladies' was expected to be a strong contender but did not receive a nomination.
  • 'Santosh' is the first Hindi-language film from the UK to be shortlisted for this category.
  • This reflects a growing recognition of international films in the Oscars.
'The recognition of 'Santosh' highlights the talents present in Hindi cinema beyond India.'

This year's nominations showcase a diverse range of films, underscoring the evolving landscape of international cinema.

item.title: Kapil Sharma BREAKS Silence About 'Insulting' Atlee: ‚ÄòWatch And Decide By Yourself‚Ä¶‚Äô - News18
item.description:
Kapil Sharma BREAKS Silence About 'Insulting' Atlee: ‚ÄòWatch And Decide By Yourself‚Ä¶‚Äô

Date: December 17, 2024 Source: News18

Filmmaker Atlee Kumar appeared on ‚ÄòThe Great Indian Kapil Show‚Äô to promote his new film, but a question posed by Kapil sparked controversy. Kapil has denied any intention to insult Atlee and has encouraged viewers to watch the interaction themselves.

  • Atlee's participation on the show led to accusations against Kapil regarding an insulting comment about Atlee's appearance.
  • Kapil urged the public to judge the interaction for themselves instead of following social media narratives.
  • Atlee responded to the controversy with a positive message about judging people by their character, not their appearance.

Dear sir, can you pls explain me where n when I talked about looks in this video ? pls don‚Äôt spread hate on social media üôè thank you. (guys watch n decide by yourself, don‚Äôt follow any body‚Äôs tweet like a sheep). ‚Äî Kapil Sharma (@KapilSharmaK9) December 17, 2024

This incident highlights the sensitivity around public comments and the impact of social media on celebrity perceptions.

item.title: Varun Dhawan and Keerthy Suresh‚Äôs remuneration for Baby John revealed - 123telugu
item.description:
Varun Dhawan and Keerthy Suresh‚Äôs remuneration for Baby John revealed

Published on Dec 18, 2024 by 123telugu

Bollywood star Varun Dhawan and National Award-winning South actress Keerthy Suresh will soon be seen in the highly anticipated action drama, Baby John, an official remake of Theri.

  • Varun Dhawan received Rs 25 crore for his role.
  • Keerthy Suresh was paid Rs 4 crore.
  • Other cast remuneration included Jackie Shroff (Rs 1.50 crore), Rajpal Yadav (Rs 1 crore), Sanya Malhotra (Rs 1 crore), and Wamiqa Gabbi (Rs 40 lakhs).
  • Salman Khan has a special cameo, but his payment is undisclosed.
  • The film is produced by Atlee, Murad Khetani, and Jyoti Deshpande, with music by Tollywood composer Thaman.
  • Release date is set for December 25, 2024.
‚ÄúGiven their massive popularity across the country, both Varun and Keerthy have reportedly been paid whopping remuneration.‚Äù

In conclusion, the financial figures associated with the star cast of Baby John reflect their significant market value and the film's high expectations.

Director Atlee, following the success of Jawan, is working on his next project titled A6 featuring Salman Khan. There are plans for a major casting coup that may include icons Rajinikanth or Kamal Haasan.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection day 13 early report: Allu Arjun film slows down, still breaks records - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 13 Early Report

Date: December 18, 2024 Source: Indian Express

The Allu Arjun-starrer continues its impressive run at the box office, making Rs 26.95 crore on its second Monday, despite the biggest drop since its release.

  • The film has made Rs 19.76 crore so far on Day 13.
  • Pushpa 2 achieved a remarkable Rs 948.81 crore total collection so far.
  • The Hindi version of the film is outperforming the original Telugu version significantly.
  • Pushpa 2 is on track to become the highest-earning Hindi film ever.
‚ÄúThese numbers are unprecedented and reflect the popularity of the franchise and the leading star.‚Äù

This trend is expected to continue until the next major release, Baby John, which could impact Pushpa 2's box office performance.

item.title: Pushpa 2 The Rule box office collection day 13: Allu Arjun film shows no sign of slowing down, collects ‚Çπ950 crore - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 The Rule Box Office Collection Day 13: Allu Arjun's Pushpa Raj Continues Its Wildfire Effect

Date: Dec 17, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The box office collection of 'Pushpa 2: The Rule' has crossed ‚Çπ950 crore in just 13 days, continuing its strong performance with minimal competition.

  • The film has maintained its momentum at the box office even in its second week, earning ‚Çπ21.33 crore on its second Tuesday.
  • Pushpa 2 had a total collection of ‚Çπ950.38 crore, with a significant portion generated from the Hindi-dubbed version.
  • The film features Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna, and Fahadh Faasil and is directed by Sukumar.
  • Pushpa 2 has already crossed the ‚Çπ1000-crore mark worldwide, ranking it among the top 10 highest-grossing Indian films ever.
‚ÄúPushpa 2 had a 21.00 percent Telugu occupancy and 18.08 percent Hindi occupancy.‚Äù

The film's success comes as Allu Arjun faced controversy due to an incident involving the death of a fan at the premiere, for which he was briefly arrested.

item.title: Shatrughan Sinha claps back at Mukesh Khanna for questioning Sonakshi Singha‚Äôs upbringing: ‚ÄòWho has appointed him the guardian of the Hindu religion?‚Äô - The Indian Express
item.description:
Shatrughan Sinha Responds to Mukesh Khanna's Criticism of Sonakshi Sinha

Publication Date: December 2024
Source: The Indian Express

Shatrughan Sinha has come to the defense of his daughter, Sonakshi, after Mukesh Khanna criticized her for not knowing an answer related to the Ramayana during a game show.

  • Shatrughan Sinha questioned Mukesh Khanna's qualifications to judge Sonakshi and challenged his authority in matters concerning Hindu beliefs.
  • He expressed pride in Sonakshi's achievements and stated that not knowing an answer does not define her as a Hindu.
  • Sonakshi criticized Khanna's focus on her during the incident, echoing Sinha's sentiments about parental values.
  • Mukesh Khanna later clarified that his intention was to address a generational shift in knowledge concerning Indian culture.
‚ÄúNot answering a question on the Ramayan doesn‚Äôt disqualify Sonakshi from being a good Hindu. She doesn‚Äôt need a certificate of approval from anyone.‚Äù - Shatrughan Sinha

The public exchange highlights the ongoing discussion about cultural knowledge in modern society, as well as the responsibilities of parents in imparting this knowledge to younger generations.

item.title: Mahira Khan recalls being offered Heeramandi in first meeting with Sanjay Leela Bhansali: ‚ÄòIt was in works but‚Ä¶' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Mahira Khan recalls being offered Heeramandi fifteen years ago when she was not even an actor, shares details of her first meeting with Sanjay Leela Bhansali.

Date: Dec 17, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

In a recent interview, Mahira Khan shared her experience of being offered a role in Heeramandi during her first meeting with filmmaker Sanjay Leela Bhansali, a significant moment in her early career.

  • Mahira Khan was introduced to Bhansali through a friend while attending a wedding in Mumbai.
  • She remembered Bhansali looking for a Pakistani actress for a project, leading to her impromptu meeting.
  • During the meeting, she was praised by Bhansali, who was interested in casting her for Heeramandi.
  • Despite the excitement, political issues prevented her from accepting the role at the time.
  • Heeramandi has since been released on Netflix, depicting the lives of courtesans during the British Raj.
‚ÄúWhat a man he is! So creative and a genius. He said, 'Can you wipe your lipstick off?' I said, 'I'm not wearing any lipstick'.‚Äù

Ultimately, Mahira's candid approach and desire for honesty regarding her marital status played a crucial role in her career decisions.

item.title: Top OTT Star Trolled: Bold Pregnancy Photoshoot - M9
item.description:
Top OTT Star Trolled: Bold Pregnancy Photoshoot

Radhika Apte, a prominent figure in the OTT space, has recently attracted both attention and criticism for her maternity photoshoot shared with Vogue.

  • Radhika Apte welcomed her first child in December 2024.
  • She shared stunning maternity photos taken shortly before giving birth, featuring elegant gowns and a showcase of her baby bump.
  • Despite the artistic nature of the photos, she faced significant trolling on social media, with many criticizing maternity shoots.
‚ÄúAm I the only one who hates maternity shoots?‚Äù

Radhika's experience highlights the complexities of public perception and personal expression, particularly for women artists.

item.description:

Atlee, director of the blockbuster Jawan, is gearing up for his next film, tentatively titled A6, which he claims will be a proud film for the nation.

item.title: Mukesh Khanna REACTS to Sonakshi Sinha's post slamming him for questioning her upbringing: 'I have a cord - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Mukesh Khanna REACTS to Sonakshi Sinha's post slamming him for questioning her upbringing

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

Mukesh Khanna has responded to Sonakshi Sinha's backlash regarding his comments on her upbringing and knowledge of the Ramayana. He clarifies that his intention was not malicious and emphasizes a need for deeper knowledge in today's generation.

  • Sonakshi Sinha criticized Mukesh Khanna for linking her inability to answer a KBC question to her father's teaching.
  • Mukesh Khanna expressed surprise at the delay in Sonakshi's response and affirmed his cordial relationship with Shatrughan Sinha.
  • He intended to comment on modern reliance on technology for information, using Sonakshi's situation as an example.
  • Sonakshi defended herself, noting that others also struggled with the same question on KBC.
  • Sonakshi recently married Zaheer Iqbal, with the wedding attended by several Bollywood celebrities.
‚ÄúDear Sir, Mukesh Khanna ji ...I recently read a statement you made saying that it's my father's fault I did not answer a question about the Ramayana correctly on a show I attended many, many years back.‚Äù - Sonakshi Sinha

This ongoing dialogue highlights the sensitive nature of public commentary on personal backgrounds and the importance of understanding context in such discussions.

item.title: Yami Gautam holds son Vedavid in her arms, joins Sanjay Dutt, Aditya Dhar to offer prayers at Golden Temple. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Yami Gautam Holds Son Vedavid in Her Arms, Joins Sanjay Dutt, Aditya Dhar to Offer Prayers at Golden Temple

Date: Dec 17, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Bollywood star Sanjay Dutt is currently in Amritsar for the shoot of his upcoming films with director Aditya Dhar. Yami Gautam joined them for a sacred visit to the Gurudwara with her newborn son, Vedavid.

  • Sanjay Dutt and Aditya Dhar offered prayers at the Golden Temple during their shooting schedule.
  • Yami Gautam participated in the visit, bringing her son Vedavid along.
  • Visuals of the visit showed the trio seeking blessings and interacting with fans.
  • Yami held Vedavid in her arms, wrapped in a cloth.
  • Sanjay Dutt met with Punjab minister Kuldeep Dhaliwal during the visit.
  • The upcoming film, in collaboration with Jio Studios, is based on historical events related to Indian Intelligence.
‚ÄúJaako raakhe sayiyaan maar sake na koi..‚Äù - Ranveer Singh on his visit to the Golden Temple.

This visit highlights the intersection of personal spirituality and professional commitments in the lives of these celebrities.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Gave 2 Pointers For Game Changer - M9
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Insights for Game Changer Film Strategies

Publication Date: Not specified Source: M9 News

The release of Pushpa 2 has provided valuable insights for the upcoming film, Game Changer. Key takeaways highlight the importance of ticket pricing and premiere strategies, suggesting a shift in approach.

  • High ticket prices for Pushpa 2 indicated negative audience reception.
  • The paid premieres scheduled for Pushpa 2 did not yield expected results.
  • Game Changer should consider avoiding paid premieres to optimize attendance.
  • Setting competitive ticket prices is crucial, learning from Pushpa 2's experience.
‚ÄúIf a sequel with a good combination couldn‚Äôt have the best of premieres, then it‚Äôs better for other films to happily stay away from it.‚Äù

In conclusion, the makers of Game Changer can benefit from analyzing Pushpa 2's approach to ticket pricing and premieres to enhance their film's success.

item.title: Mukesh Khanna reacts after Sonakshi Sinha slams him for questioning her upbringing: ‚ÄòSurprised she took so much time‚Äô - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Mukesh Khanna says he didn't have any malicious intention as he reacts to Sonakshi Sinha slamming him for questioning her upbringing.

Publication Date: Dec 17, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Mukesh Khanna has responded to Sonakshi Sinha's criticism regarding his comments on her upbringing, clarifying he had no malicious intent.

  • Sonakshi criticized Mukesh for connecting her inability to answer a Ramayana question on KBC to her upbringing.
  • Mukesh expressed surprise at the time it took for Sonakshi to respond.
  • He aimed to highlight the limits of knowledge in the current generation compared to past generations.
  • Sonakshi defended herself, pointing out that another contestant also failed to answer the same question on the show.
‚ÄúI am surprised she took so much time to react. I had no malicious intention to malign her or her father.‚Äù - Mukesh Khanna

The exchange highlights ongoing discussions about celebrity accountability and generational knowledge differences.
